childMdx.excerpt: A green spider greeted me as I got back home today, telling me of that time I sat in the Great Hall and gave my faith in a language long…
Here is a gift of two Egyptian geese ghosting across the full moon as it dips below the dawn horizon, which is the meaning of "I take refuge…
No-one wrote this dedication. No-one will ever read it.   Truth took me and I said: You are my teacher.   One real laugh returned, resigned…
